title: ‘The Challenge: Spies, Lies, and Allies’ Episode 11 With Ed | Death, Taxes, and Bananas
description:
Rookie Ed Eason joins Johnny Bananas to talk about Episode 11 of ‘Spies, Lies, and Allies.’ First Ed tells Johnny how he got his start in reality on ‘The Circle’ (0:30) and how he approached the challenge of coming on ‘The Challenge’ late as an alternate (19:06). Then they dive into Episode 11. They discuss the game shifting from pairs to teams (39:36), the season’s first heights over water challenge (52:25), Ed putting a target on his back for nominations (59:23), and the intense pole wrestling elimination between him and Kyle (1:22:04).
Host: Johnny Bananas
Guest: Ed Eason
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Additional Production: Juliet Litman
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
